pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Cross-Z Charge's $(l:build/devices/sclash_driver)Sclash Driver (Cross-Z Charge)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Cross-Z Charge's $(l:build/riders/cross-z#charge)base$(/l) form
Obtained by using the $(l:build/items/fullbottles#dragon_full_bottle)Dragon Fullbottle$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/fullbottle_solidifier)Fullbottle Solidifier$(/l)

pages.title: Robot Sclashjelly
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Grease's $(l:build/devices/sclash_driver_grease)Sclash Driver (Grease)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Grease's $(l:build/riders/grease)base$(/l) form
